tool.name: Validate
tool.help:
**Description**
Validates an SBML_ Level 3 instance using the public SBML online validator.
-----
**Input**
* An SBML Level 3 instance (XML file)
-----
**Output**
* If true, then reports the file as a valid instance. False, otherwise.
.. _SBML: http://sbml.org/Documents/Specifications/SBML_Level_3
